:
A minimum monthly spend of  5,000 per statement is required to earn 5% Plus Points on Grocery, Electronics, Utilities, Education and Fuel categories. If the minimum monthly spend is not met, you will earn 1.5% Plus Points.
For all other categories, 0.5% Plus Points will continue to remain applicable.
Maximum Plus Points per statement will be capped at 500.
Airport transfers and Valet Parking will be discontinued.
Benefits of your Duo Credit Cards

Premium lounge access worldwide with your Diners Club and Mastercard cards

metadata.title: Duo Credit Cards - Double the Rewards, Double the Value | Emirates NBD

content:
Use both your Diners and Mastercard credit card to gain access to over 300 airport lounges across the Middle East and over
1,500
lounges across the world*.
Mastercard lounge access
Indulge in over 25 regional and international LoungeKey, marhaba and CAC lounges across the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Jordan, Kuwait, Egypt, Morocco, USA, UK, Canada, Germany, France, Singapore and more, no matter which airline or airline class you're travelling in. Simply present your Mastercard credit card at any participating LoungeKey Program airport lounge and enter immediately. Supplementary cardholders can use this benefit too.
Enjoy complimentary visits for self. Additional guests will be charged extra.
Learn more about activating Lounge Key and other terms & conditions
Diners Club lounge access
Indulge in over
1,500
comfortable premium lounges in more than
700

metadata.title: Duo Credit Cards - Double the Rewards, Double the Value | Emirates NBD

content:
Know more
Buy 1 get 1 offer on tickets at Cine Royals Cinemas
You can get your tickets from the Cine Royals Cinemas website when you pay with your card
Benefits:
 40.25 for two regular 2D Standard tickets.
15% discount on Food and Beverages purchased using the Eligible Card.
Eligibility:
Minimum Spend Criteria Applies.
Cardholder can redeem up to 3 tickets per month.
Service charges of  125/- + VAT will be applicable if the spend is below the required amount.
Learn more about your Cine Royals Cinemas benefit
Terms and Conditions:
The Bank’s Emirates NBD Credit Cardholders, holding Emirates NBD Diners credit cards, (herein referred to as “Eligible Cardholders”), Get one 2D standard class movie tickets complimentary on purchase of the first one. The Offer will be valid for the purchase of one 2D standard class movie tickets to any show at any of the Cine Royal locations.

metadata.title: Duo Credit Cards - Double the Rewards, Double the Value | Emirates NBD

content:
The Offer shall also include 15% discount on Food and Beverages purchased using the Eligible Card. The customer has to show the ticket reference number to the snack bar counter. Subject to minimum purchase of  30.
The Offer shall be available for purchases by the Eligible Cardholders through
www.cineroyal.ae
, through Cine Royal Mobile Application.
Cardholders can avail a maximum of 3 (three) free tickets in a single transaction & maximum of 3 (three) free tickets per month.
Movie tickets are subject to availability all tickets purchased in accordance with the Offer shall be utilized at the specific time and for the show they were purchased for, and shall not be carried forward for any other show on that or another day.
This Offer shall not be valid in conjunction with any special promotion, private screening, or premiere at Cine Royal Cinemas.
Golf privileges
Tee off and conquer new terrain
